tig058.handin01.registry

Class ClubRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • tig058.handin01.registry.ClubRegistry

  • public class ClubRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A class abstracting the the ClubStore to make it easier to write more user logical functionality for developers. This class uses the ClubStore interface and not any instance implementing the Interface.

      • getInstance

        public static ClubRegistry getInstance()
        We prevent multiple instances of this class by setting the constructor to private. In order to get hold of the only instance this method can be used.

        ClubRegistry the single instance of the ClubRegistry class

        ArrayList of members

      • getMembers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Member> getMembers(java.lang.String needle)
        Returns a list of all the Members that matches the expression specified by the caller. The expression is matched against the name (given and family) of the Members. The syntax of the expression was originally aimed at being SQL compliant, but is now only supporting the following: 
            % - a wildcard

 Exmaples of  search strings:

 "Joni" will return all members with either the given
 name or the family name equal to "Joni"
 
 "Joni%" will return all members with either the given name or
 the family name equal to "Joni" followed by any character or
 characters so "Jonin" will also match.
 
 "%oni" will return all members with either the given name or
 the family name beginning with any character or charcters
 followed by "oni" so "Joni" and "Toni" and many more will
 match.
 
 "%oni%" will return all members with either the given name or
 the family name beginning with any character or charcters
 followed by "oni" so "Joni" and "Toni" in turned followed by
 any character or characters so "Joni", "Jonin", "Thoniloli"
 will also match, as will will many more.
        Parameters:
        String - - the expression
        Returns:
        ArrayList of members

      • getAdults

        public java.util.ArrayList<Member> getAdults(Member child)
        Finds and returns the adults of a given Member. If the Member is adult himself/herself null is returned.
        Parameters:
        Member - - Member to find adults to
        Returns:
        Null is returned if the Member is an adult. Otherwise a list (may be of zero size) with parents is returned.
